scripts.package-server: electron-packager ./server/ classroomServer --platform=win32 --win32metadata.ProductName 威爱通教室  --win32metadata.FileDescription 威爱通教师端  --out ./package --version 1.3.5 --overwrite --icon img/classroom.ico
scripts.package-client: electron-packager ./client/ classroomClient --platform=win32  --win32metadata.ProductName 威爱通  --win32metadata.FileDescription 威爱通客户端  --out ./package --version 1.3.5 --overwrite --icon img/classroom.ico
